variables.title: Distribution of Syringes Laws
variables.name: NtPrFrDsSy
variables.description: Dummy variable indicating whether the state law does not prohibit free distribution of syringes (0=no, 1=yes)

variables.title: Drug Paraphernalia Laws

variables.description: Dummy variable indicating whether the state has no state drug paraphernalia law (0=no, 1=yes)

variables.title: Laws removing barriers to SSPs
variables.name: NoLwRmUnc
variables.description: Dummy variable indicating whether the state has no law removing barriers or uncertainty as to SSP legality (0=no, 1=yes)

variables.title: Paraphernalia does not refer to objects used for injecting drugs
variables.name: PrNtRefInj
variables.description: Dummy variable indicating whether the paraphernalia definition in the state law does not refer to objects used for injecting drugs (0=no, 1=yes)

variables.title: Paraphernalia exludes objects used for injecting drugs
variables.name: PrExcInj
variables.description: Dummy variable indicating whether the paraphernalia definition in the state law explicitly exludes objects used for injecting drugs (0=no, 1=yes)

variables.title: Syringe Service Program (SSP) Authorization Laws
variables.name: ExpSsp
variables.description: Dummy variable indicating whether the state has law that explicitly authorizes Syringe Service Programs (0=no, 1=yes)

variables.title: Any Horowitz PDMP (fraction of year in 2017)
variables.name: AnyPdmphFr
variables.description: Fraction of year that state has prescription drug monitoring program enabling legislation for any type of prescription drug monitoring program in effect ,including paper-based systems (as determined by Horowitz et al., 2018) enacted

variables.title: Any Horowitz PDMP start date
variables.name: AnyPdmphDt
variables.description: Date when PDMP enabling legislation was first enacted for any type of PDMP in effect (including paper-based systems). Source: Horowitz et al., 2018, Table 2, column 1.

variables.title: Any PDMP (fraction of year in 2017)
variables.name: AnyPdmpFr
variables.description: Fraction of year that state has any prescription drug monitoring program operating.

variables.title: Any PDMP start date
variables.name: AnyPdmpDt
variables.description: Date when PDMP enabling legislation was first enacted for any type of PDMP in effect (including paper-based systems). Source: PDAPS for first PDMP laws passed after January 1, 1998; Info on laws prior to 1998 came from Brandeis TTAC.

variables.title: Electronic PDMP (fraction of year in 2017)
variables.name: ElcPdmpFr
variables.description: Fraction of year that state has an electronic PDMP system operating.

variables.title: Electronic PDMP start date
variables.name: ElcPdmpDt
variables.description: Date state began operating an electronic PDMP system.

variables.title: Must-Access PDMP (fraction of year in 2017)
variables.name: MsAcPdmpFr
variables.description: Fraction of year that state has any legislation requiring Prescribers to access PDMP before prescribing (as interpreted by PDAPS) enacted.

variables.title: Must-Access PDMP start date
variables.name: MsAcPdmpDt
variables.description: Date of legislation requiring Prescribers to access PDMP before prescribing as interpreted by PDAPS.

variables.title: Operational PDMP (fraction of year in 2017)
variables.name: OpPdmpFr
variables.description: Fraction of year that state has a “modern system” operational and users could access (as determined by Horowitz et al., 2018).

variables.title: Operational PDMP start date
variables.name: OpPdmpDt
variables.description: Date when a “modern system” became operational and users could access. Source: Horowitz et al., 2018, Table 2, column 4. This definition includes specific caveats adopted by Horowitz et al., 2018, described further below in Notes.

variables.title: Census Flags
variables.name: CenFlags
variables.description:
Three different values indicating three things:
1 - Revised count, so urban and rural components will not add to total. 
2 - Geography name and FIPS code were changed since 2010. Shannon County, Sotuh Dakota name changed to Oglala Lakota County, new FIPS 46102. Wade Hampton Census Area, Alaska, name changed to Kusilvak CEnsus Area, nwe FIPS 02158
3 - Bedford City, Virginia, was consolidated with Bedford County, Virginia (FIPS 51019) since 2010.
